section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term "public transit services operated by the District government" means the D.C. Circulator bus system and the District's streetcar system.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6042 of the Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-91, July 22, 2019, 66 DCR 8497).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6042 of the Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-112, Sept. 4, 2019, 66 DCR 11964).
